continuous: Draw a card at the start of your turn.

trigger: When your opponent attacks a creature: give that creature 50 strength.
When your opponent draws a card from a card effect: they discard 2 random cards.
When your opponent buffs a creature they control: dispel all their creatures
continuous: Give 5 strength to all your creatures.

trigger: When a creature you control is destroyed: add that creature to your hand.
When your opponent's deck reaches 15 cards: nullify this counter.
continuous: Whenever you mill card(s): your opponent mills a card.

trigger: When your opponent targets a creature you control: change the target to another creature you control.
When you sacrifice a creature: draw a card and nullify this counter.
continuous: Creatures you control can be used as 2 sacrifices each.

trigger: When your opponent activates a spell: sacrifice a creature to nullify that spell.
When your opponent activates a counter: mill 4 cards to nullify that counter.
When your opponent plays a creature: sacrifice a creature to nullify that creature.
When your opponent plays a creature: discard a card to destroy all creatures.
After you mill a card: add that card to your hand.
